verse.name: v1
verse.lines: They who know the Savior shall in Him be strong, Mighty in the conflict of the right ’gainst wrong; This the blessed promise given in God’s Word, Doing wondrous exploits, they who know the Lord.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Victory! victory! Blessed, blood-bought victory! Victory! victory! Vict’ry all the time! As Jehovah liveth, strength divine He giveth Unto those who know Him—vict’ry all the time!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: In the midst of battle be thou not dismayed, Though the pow’rs of darkness ’gainst thee are arrayed; God, thy Strength, is with thee, causing thee to stand, Heaven’s allied armies wait at thy command.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Brave to bear life’s testing, strong the foe to meet, Walking like a hero midst the furnace heat, Doing wondrous exploits with the Spirit’s sword, Winning souls for Jesus, praise, oh, praise the Lord!
